name: Broken Promises
flavorText: A great melancholy has been known to strike those who wear this ring. Archaic hieroglyphs inscribed on its band tell a tale of unrelenting heartbreak and sorrow.

primary.textHtml: Reduces all resource costs by [5.0 - 8.0]%.

secondary.textHtml: After 5 consecutive non-critical hits, your chance to critically hit is increased to 100% for 3 seconds. 3
